parsed.internal_thinking: The game is in the setup phase, and I need to place my first settlement. I will choose a node that has access to a variety of resources to maximize my chances of getting a good start. I will choose node 20 as it is adjacent to forest, pasture and fields. This placement will give me initial access to wood, sheep and wheat.
parsed.note_to_self: Remember to place a road after placing the settlement.
parsed.say_outloud: I will place my settlement on node 20.
